trans-unit.source: Represents an access control list (ACL) and is the base class for the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> class.
The revision level of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref>.
This value is returned by the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision"></xref> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are not associated with Directory Services objects.
The revision level cannot be changed after an instance of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> class has been created.
The revision level of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref>.
This value is returned by the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision"></xref> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are associated with Directory Services objects.
Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object.
This length should be used before marshaling the ACL into a binary array with the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)"></xref> method.
The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object.
Copies each <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> into the specified array.

The array into which copies of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> objects contained by the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> are placed.
The zero-based index of array where the copying begins.
Gets the number of access control entries (ACEs) in the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object.
The number of ACEs in the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object.
Marshals the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
The byte array into which the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> is marshaled.
The offset at which to start marshaling.
offset is negative or too high to allow the entire to be copied into array.
Retrieves an object that you can use to iterate through the access control entries (ACEs) in an access control list (ACL).
An enumerator object.
This property is always set to `false`.
It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> interface.
Always `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> to get or set.
The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> at the specified index.
The maximum allowed binary length of a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> object.
Gets the revision level of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref>.
A byte value that specifies the revision level of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref>.
This property always returns `null`.
It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> interface.
Always returns `null`.
Copies each <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> into the specified array.

The array into which copies of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"></xref> objects contained by the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"></xref> are placed.
The zero-based index of array where the copying begins.
Returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator"></xref> class cast as an instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> interface.
A new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator"></xref> object, cast as an instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> interface.
